name: Ashton
text: Ugh! I lost again!

name: Eve
text: Told ya’! I’m wayyy better at this than you.

name: Nathan
text: It’s not our fault you spend three hours playing video games every day. Some of us have things to do.

name: Eve
text: Mhm, because I’m just the most booorriing person you’ve ever met.

name: Eve
text: Boring, boring, boring!

name: Nathan
text: That’s not what I meant…

name: Ashton
text: Hey Tiana, you good?

name: Tiana
text: Hm? Oh, yeah, just reading an article my sister sent me.

name: Tiana
text: You know the old middle school out by the swamp? Apparently they’re tearing it down.

name: Ashton
text: Which one’s that?

name: Nathan
text: The really old one that you drive by when you go to my house.

name: Ashton
text: Oh, got it. Good riddance, that thing’s falling apart.

name: Nathan
text: Been closed for so long, I can’t imagine why they kept it up.

name: Eve
text: Ha! It’s ‘cause everyone’s afraid.

name: Ashton
text: Afraid of an old school? What’s the worst thing they’ll find in there, asbestos?

name: Eve
text: More like evil spirits.

name: Nathan
text: Evil asbestos spirits?

name: Eve
text: No! I’m being serious. They tried to tear it down when I was kid and stopped because of all the paranormal activity.

name: Tiana
text: Mhm! That place is super haunted.

name: Ashton
text: Random haunted school? Yeah, sure, like I’d believe that.

name: Eve
text: It’s not random!

name: Ashton
text: Why though?

name: Eve
text: Ugh, you’re so annoying sometimes. A bunch of people went missing at the school, and they never found them.

name: Ashton
text: And you think…they’re haunting the school?

name: Tiana
text: I mean, my mom’s friend who worked on the first demolition said he saw something.

name: Nathan
text: Probably an asbestos induced hallucination.

name: Tiana
text: Asbestos doesn’t do that!

name: Eve
text: Yeah, and everything I said is completely true. You can look it up.

name: Ashton
text: I’m not saying I don’t believe people went missing, I’m saying I don’t believe in ghosts.

name: Eve
text: How do you not believe in ghosts?! They’re everywhere!

name: Nathan
text: You’ve been saying everything’s haunted since second grade.

name: Eve
text: And how many times have I been right?

name: Nathan
text: Zero. You’ve been right zero times.

name: Eve
text: I think that’s an exaggeration.

name: Tiana
text: I don’t think we should write off what she’s saying. That place is so weird…

name: Ashton
text: It can’t be, like, haunted weird though.

name: Eve
text: What do I have to do to get you to believe me?

name: Ashton
text: I don’t think there’s anything you can do to get me to believe you.

name: Eve
text: Hm...

name: Eve
text: What if I go in there and get a picture?

name: Ashton
text: Um-

name: Eve
text: That’s what I’ll do! You’re going to eat your words, Ash!

name: Tiana
text: That’s dangerous! You don’t have to do that.

name: Eve
text: Okay, okay, but have you considered that maybe I really really want to go in there?

name: Nathan
text: Why would you ever want to do that?

name: Eve
text: I dunno, sounds cool.

name: Eve
text: Might be fun.
